input_email_body:
Subject: Assistance with TP-Link EAP245 Wi-Fi Issues

Dear Customer Support, 

I am writing to seek assistance regarding frequent Wi-Fi disconnections that I am experiencing with my TP-Link Access Point EAP245. The device has been intermittently disconnecting from the network, causing significant disruption to my work My name is Jane Smith.. I have attempted several troubleshooting steps, including power cycling the device and updating the firmware, but the issue persists. 

Could you please provide guidance on any specific troubleshooting steps I might be missing, or suggest a possible resolution to this issue? My account number is <acc_num>, and I am reachable at <tel_num> if you need any further information. 

Thank you for your attention to this matter. 

Sincerely, 
<name> You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.
